resources.string: Requests app to quit.\nUsed to kill simple apps that don\'t have background services.
Kills tasks via PID.\nUsed to kill process that like to restart themselves.
Kills task using Force Close via ICS+ method (Same as going to app and clicking force Close).\nRecommended option. If you see this option use it.
Kills task by disabling the package and re-enabling it.\nRecommended to try a lower one first. But this will almost certainly kill the app, and prevent it from restarting.
Variable will be substituted when task is ran.
